Project.name: PureMVC Java Version Unit Tests
Project.Description: These are the unit tests for the PureMVC Standard Version for Java.
Project.ReleaseNotes:
Summary of Changes in 0.2
  • A port of the unit tests for the AS3 Standard Version
  • These are standard JUnit Tests.
Project.Installation:
Installing the Project Source Code From the archive
  • Download the latest source code archive
  • Unzip the source code zip to any folder on your disk. For instance:
    • c:\development\
  • You will see a PureMVC_Java_UnitTests_X_Y (where X_Y is version) source folder. For instance:
c:\development\PureMVC_Java_UnitTests_X_Y From the Repository
  • Use your favorite SVN client to retrieve the latest source code release from the repository.
